text:
Gwynfor "Gwyn" Jones (20 March 1935 – 13 November 2020) was a Welsh footballer. He played in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Bristol Rovers.
Jones began his playing career at Caernarfon Town, before joining English First Division high-flyers Wolverhampton Wanderers in 1955.
Jones died on 13 November 2020 at a nursing home in Caernarfon, Wales at the age of 85.
